headline.main: REICH HINTS DRIVE IS NOW ON IN RUSSIA; Spring Offensive Under Way on Southern Sector, Berlin Military Indicates BULGARS ON THIS FRONT Stockholm Hears Germans Will Employ New Weapons, Tactics and Strategy

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, April 2 -- Bulgarian troops are already on the southern Russian front, reports the Berlin correspondent of the German-inspired S.T.B. News Agency, citing "well informed circles." The correspondent adds that "although German troops are still concentrating on holding the Winter lines, it is hinted in military circles that as far as the southern sector is concerned it is already possible to speak of the beginning of the long-expected offensive."
abstract: Germans hint Spring drive on, southern sector
